The Garden

🌱 Metric-driven evolution vs. aesthetical intention

Exploration on how metrics culture iis affecting the discource community of designers

Published on April 09, 2024

🌱 Metric-driven evolution vs. aesthetical intention

Exploration on how metrics culture iis affecting the discource community of designers

Published on April 09, 2024

I find ability to share the worldview and ideas in delepoment helpful and potentially . For my digital garden, I was inspired by and shamelessly copied Maggie Apleton's metaphor:

  • 🌱 Seedling: Early explorations, raw thoughts
  • 🌿 Budding: Somewhat developed, might have major iterations to come
  • 🌱 Evergreen: Mostly finished, at most minor iterations to come

Want to share your thoughts? Feel free to say Hi 👋
